title: Compressor
slogan: A free and open source file compression tool

footer.contactUsDesc: After scanning the above QR code, follow the wechat public account of programming industry and reply the key words compressor to join the communication group

notFound.description: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist!

errorBoundary.tips: Sorry for the inconvenience, please refresh and try again. If you can't solve it, you can report the problem in the issue list!

compressInfo.count: {{fileTotalCount}} files in total, {{successFileTotalCount}} were successfully compressed
compressInfo.successRatio: , the volume is reduced by {{successCompressSize}} and the compression ratio is {{successCompressRatio}}%

deleteFile.title: Delete All Files?
deleteFile.content: If you click OK, the converted file will be deleted from the server

upload.text: Click or drag files to this area for compression
upload.hint: Supports single or batch upload compression, there is no limit on the number or size of files

compressSetting.desc: Adjust the configuration to optimize the compression results, the following are optional operations, the system has provided the default configuration during processing

png.qualityDesc: The quality parameter determines the quality of the compression. The minimum and maximum values are numbers between 0 (worst) and 100 (perfect). It was found that setting the parameter to 65 - 80 can achieve a good balance between file size and image quality.
png.speedDesc: The speed parameter determines the execution speed of image optimization, the value range is 1~11, the default value is 4
png.ditheringDesc: Set the dithering level using a fractional number between 0 (none) and 1 (full).
png.posterrizeDesc: Truncate number of least significant bits of color (per channel). Use this when image will be output on low-depth displays (e.g. 16-bit RGB). pngquant will make almost-opaque pixels fully opaque and will reduce amount of semi-transparent colors.

jpg.qualityDesc: The quality parameter determines the quality of the compression. The minimum and maximum values are numbers between 0 (worst) and 100 (perfect).
jpg.progressiveDesc: default true, false creates baseline JPEG file.
jpg.targaDesc: Input file is Targa format (usually not needed)
jpg.revertDesc: Revert to standard defaults instead of mozjpeg defaults

dcScanOptValues.three: 2 Optimize between one scan for all components and one scan for 1st component plus one scan for remaining components

jpg.trellisDesc: Trellis quantization is an algorithm that can improve data compression in DCT-based encoding methods.

gif.optimizationLevelDesc: The optimization level determines how much optimization is done; higher levels take longer, but may have better results.

optimizationLevelValues.one: 1. Stores only the changed portion of each image.
optimizationLevelValues.two: 2. Also uses transparency to shrink the file further.
optimizationLevelValues.three: 3. Try several optimization methods (usually slower, sometimes better results)

gif.colorsDesc: Reduce the number of distinct colors in each output GIF to num or less. Num must be between 2 and 256.

webp.presetDesc: Preset setting, one of default, photo, picture, drawing, icon and text.
webp.methodDesc: Specify the compression method to use, between 0 (fastest) and 6 (slowest). This parameter controls the trade off between encoding speed and the compressed file size and quality.
webp.sharpnessDesc: Set filter sharpness between 0 (sharpest) and 7 (least sharp).
webp.nearLosslessDesc: Encode losslessly with an additional lossy pre-processing step, with a quality factor between 0 (maximum pre-processing) and 100 (same as lossless).
